apiDoc.name: ZapSendRoot
apiDoc.description: Root component for custom zap sending interfaces using Svelte actions. Provides a send action that children can attach to any element. Supports optional zap splits for distributing payments across multiple recipients. Sets zap send context for nested components. Uses Svelte 5 snippet pattern with action parameter.

props.name: recipient
props.description: Event or user to send zap to

props.name: splits
props.description: Optional zap splits for multi-recipient payments

props.name: children
props.description: Snippet receiving send action for zap triggers
